article:
Hi! My name is Martin. I come from the USA. I'm in Shanghai, China now . My telephone number is (021)83130761. I am in No. 6 Junior High School. I'm in Class Five, Grade Seven. Hu Jing and Xiao Bin are my Chinese friends. We're in the same school. We are all  thirteen .
Miss Qiu is my English teacher. She has a round face, a big nose and big eyes. I like  her very much .
,.
